General.Name: GeneBioTech Co. Ltd
General.Description: Genebiotech Co., Ltd., a specialized fermentation company, researches, develops, produces, and sells biological resources for use in animal resources, agriculture, food, medicine, etc. It offers functional feed ingredients and additives, as well as veterinary medicines. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Gongju, South Korea.

0.Name: Mr. Chan-Ho  Lee
0.Title: Chief Exec. Officer and Representative Director
